name: IssueVercelCertificate
description:
Request a new SSL certificate from Vercel.

This tool is used to issue a new SSL certificate through Vercel's API. It's called when you need to obtain a certificate for secure communication with your Vercel-hosted applications.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the Vercel team on whose behalf the certificate request is made.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The team slug identifier for cert request on behalf of a specific team.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: common_names_for_certificate
parameters.description: List of common names (domains) that the SSL certificate should be issued for.

value_schema.description: The common names the cert should be issued for

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: cns
parameters.description: The common names the cert should be issued for

value_schema.description: The common names the cert should be issued for
